00020 vector<string> extends;
00021 vector<string> attributes;
00022 vector<string> semantics;
00023 vector<string> rules;
00024 
00025 void v_extend (char const* str, char const* end)
00026 {
00027     string  s(str, end);
00028     extends.push_back(s);
00029 }
00030 
00031 void v_semantic (char const* str, char const* end)
00032 {
00033     string  s(str, end);
00034     semantics.push_back(s);
00035 }

00039     string  s(str, end);
00040     attributes.push_back(s);
00041 }
00042 
00043 void v_rule (char const* str, char const* end)
00044 {
00045     string  s(str, end);
00046     rules.push_back(s);
00047 }

00049 void add2vector (char const* str, char const* end, vector<string>* vec)
00050 {
00051     string  s(str, end);
00052     vec->push_back(s);
00053 }

00056 void imprimir(){
00057         cout << "Extend\n";
00058     for (vector<string>::size_type i = 0; i < extends.size(); ++i)
00059         cout << i << ": " << extends[i] << endl;
00060         cout << "Semantic\n";
00061     for (vector<string>::size_type i = 0; i < semantics.size(); ++i)
00062         cout << i << ": " << semantics[i] << endl;
00063         cout << "Attribute\n";
00064     for (vector<string>::size_type i = 0; i < attributes.size(); ++i)
00065         cout << i << ": " << attributes[i] << endl;
00066         cout << "Rule\n";
00067     for (vector<string>::size_type i = 0; i < rules.size(); ++i)
00068         cout << i << ": " << rules[i] << endl;
00069 }
00070 
00071 struct att_grammar: public grammar<att_grammar>
00072     {
00073         template <typename ScannerT>
00074         struct definition
00075         {
00076             definition(att_grammar const &self)
00077             {
00078                         r_ident = (+alpha_p) >> *(alnum_p);
00079                         r_extends = strlit<>("extends:") >> r_ident[&v_extend] >> *(',' >> r_ident[&v_extend])>> ';';
00080                         r_semantics = strlit<>("semantics:") >> r_ident[&v_semantic] >> *(',' >> r_ident[&v_semantic])>> ';';
00081                         r_rules = strlit<>("rules:") >> r_ident[&v_rule] >> *(',' >> r_ident[&v_rule])>> ';';
00082                         r_attributes = strlit<>("attributes:") >> r_ident[&v_attribute] >> *(',' >> r_ident[&v_attribute]) >> ';';
00083                         at_grammar = !(r_extends) >> r_semantics >> r_attributes >> r_rules;
00084             }
00085 
00086             rule<ScannerT> r_ident, r_extends, r_semantics, r_rules, r_attributes, at_grammar;
00087             rule<ScannerT> const&
00088             start() const { return at_grammar; }
00089         };
00090 };
00091 
00092 bool parse_grammar(char const* str)
00093 {
00094         att_grammar gramatica;
00095         return parse(str,gramatica,space_p).full;
00096 }
